{{title|iter_swap{{small|(ranges::join_with_view::''iterator'')}}}}
{{cpp/ranges/join_with_view/navbar}}

{{ddcl|since=c++23|
friend constexpr void iter_swap( const /*iterator*/&amp; x, const /*iterator*/&amp; y )
    requires std::indirectly_swappable&lt;ranges::iterator_t&lt;/*InnerBase*/&gt;,
                                       ranges::iterator_t&lt;/*PatternBase*/&gt;&gt;;
}}

Applies {{lc|ranges::iter_swap}} to the inner iterators as if by {{box|{{c/core|std::visit(ranges::iter_swap, x.}}{{rlpsi|/#inner_it_}}{{sep}}{{c/core|, y.}}{{rlpsi|/#inner_it_}}{{sep}}{{c/core|);}}}}.

{{cpp/hidden friend|{{tt|join_with_view::''iterator''}}{{sep}}{{tt|&lt;Const&gt;}}}}

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|x, y|iterators to the elements to swap}}
{{par end}}
